thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 170 of 3569
thread.title: Jill

author: Jill
title: Jill
text:
I'm used to ordering my books using the desktop site. I used the mobile site this time, and didn't have the option of choosing my book location source. I don't know if this is a "new" thing (I hadn't ordered in a couple of years), or if it's just the way mobile is set up, but the browsing experience was definitely different.
No clue why the books had to go an extra 400 miles south of me before they came back this way (I'm only about 90 miles from the DC they came from), but it added to the shipping time, which disappointed me.
